strings:
<voice_0x01000B6C><se_def>Marcello: ...Well done! You managed to cause another
brawl at the Simpleton pub.
I hope you're proud of yourself.

<voice_0x01000B6D><se_def>Angelo: News travels fast.
What a fine intelligence network the Templars h<endash>
<voice_0x01000B6E><se_def>Marcello: How much more shame do you intend to bring to our abbey!? You're like a curse!

<voice_0x01000B6F><se_def>Marcello: Yes, a filthy curse. If you hadn't been born,
we'd all have been spared a lot of misery.

<voice_0x01000B71><se_def>Marcello: You're nothing but a petty crook with a
pretty face.

<voice_0x01000B72><se_def>Marcello: It sickens me to think we share any
common blood.

<voice_0x01000B74><se_def>Marcello: Templar Angelo! By order of the Captain,
you are sentenced to a term of penitence.

<voice_0x01000B75><se_def>Marcello: I'm hereby stripping you of your right to
leave the abbey. You do not leave this place.
Not for anything! Understood?
<voice_0x01000B76><se_def>Marcello: Cross me on this, and I'll see to it that you're expelled from the Order! And don't think the Abbot will be able to protect you this time!
